constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA New Malden District Centre Inset Area
ART4 New Malden District Centre Inset Area

description: Details required by Condition 3/4 (Delivery and Servicing Management Plan), Condition 5 (Refuse/Recycling Store),Condition 6 (Cycle Parking) and Condition 12 (Travel Plan) of Planning Permission 19/02212/FUL (Change of use of first floor from ancillary retail (Use Class A1) to a gym (Use Class D2))
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are fully discharged.

The assessment has been based on the original layout of the house that shows a staggered rear elevation. The proposed extension would extend beyond the side elevation and would  have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Please amend the area shown on the application as gained floorspace as a result of the proposed works. In addition please calculate the planning costs which form part of your submission based on the proposed new development floorspace
